subject: Re: A shipment from order #SSN3386 is on the way
description_text:

￼
Thanks,
Visvaldas

conversations.body_text: Hi Visvaldas Stonkus,    We apologize for the inconvenience caused. We will confirm this for you as soon as possible.

Hello,
any update regarding the shipping please?

Thanks,
Visvaldas

>
Hi Visvaldas Stonkus,    The original shipping route is unavailable. We have upgraded your shipping route for you.

Can you please give me the tracking number?

>
